hero.name: Zycos
short_lore: The Divine Peaks prided itself on its formidable army and elite warriors, with Zycos quickly rising through the ranks. She became a prominent figure, leading many successful campaigns to defend the empire's borders and maintain peace within the realm.
- Increase armor durability upon successfully killing an enemy
hero.title: Volcanic Guardian

hero.name: Sian
short_lore: Forged in the heart of an ancient volcano, Sian, the Infernal Peaks, is a warrior whose soul burns with the fury of the underworld. Legend says her dark armor was tempered in dragon fire, granting her a fiery presence that turns the tide of battle. Her fiery gaze alone can ignite fear, and it is whispered that the very ground trembles when she takes the field.
- On getting damage launch undestructive Dragon Fireball toward the enemy (2% chance)
hero.title: Infernal Peaks

hero.name: Rina
short_lore: Ascending to the throne of the Sky Empress after becoming storm dragons, Rina's ethereal beauty and command of the skies are legendary. She dances among the clouds, guiding the winds and weather. Her presence ensures the safety and prosperity of Divine Peaks.
- When trading with villager, there is a chance you will get half of your money back (15%)
hero.title: Sky Empress

hero.name: Rhaelys
short_lore: Under the blood moon's light, the leader of the Elite Wyrmbane Sentinels commands with an iron will. Her void-black armor absorbs the essence of night, and her meteorite iron sword cleaves through the toughest scales. The Sentinels, striking from the shadows, leave only whispers and legends behind.
- When trading with villager, there is a chance you will get half of your money back (15%)
hero.title: Wyrmbane Sentinel

hero.name: Moon Wing
short_lore: Born under a rare eclipse, Moon Wing, the Nightblade Empress, wields dark powers with unparalleled skill. Her black and red armor, horns, and slit red eyes strike fear into foes. Her smile, framed by short black and blue-purple hair, foretells doom or victory.
- Increase armor durability upon successfully killing an enemy
hero.title: title_name

hero.name: Nine
short_lore: Born under a rare eclipse, Moon Wing, the Nightblade Empress, wields dark powers with unparalleled skill. Her black and red armor, horns, and slit red eyes strike fear into foes. Her smile, framed by short black and blue-purple hair, foretells doom or victory
- Blocked arrows and tridents are reflected back in your line of sight ()
- Gives a passive increase to natural regeneration on taking damage
hero.title: Illusionist Adept

hero.name: Searia
short_lore: Born amidst a cataclysmic storm, she tamed the raging elements, earning her place among the legends of Moonlit Lilies. Her mastery over fire, water, earth, and air is unparalleled. In times of strife, she channels the raw forces of nature, protecting her homeland with the fury of the storm
hero.title: Elemental Archmage

hero.name: Seventy One
short_lore: A prodigy lost in the labyrinth of the World Library, she deciphers the fire arcane scripts that others have long forgotten. Her spells, drawn from the depths of ancient tomes, defy the conventions of magic. Many fear her power, for she commands the forbidden arts with an expertise unmatched
hero.title: Chantless Prodigy

hero.name: Lorekeeper
short_lore: Guardian of the World Library, this sage holds the keys to the deepest arcane mysteries. The Lorekeeper's wisdom is a beacon, guiding those who seek enlightenment. Their knowledge is a powerful tool, revealing hidden truths and unraveling the secrets of the past
hero.title: Guardian of the Library

hero.name: Frost
short_lore: From the heart of the Frozen Realm, Frost wields the power of winter's fury. Her presence alone can summon blizzards that blanket the battlefield in ice. Tales speak of her single-handedly halting an invading force, encasing them in a glacier that still stands as a warning to all who threaten her homeland
hero.title: Glacial Guardian

hero.name: Luzia
short_lore: In the perpetual twilight of the Frozen Realm, Luzia's brilliance shines like the auroras that dance across the night sky. Her mastery over light and ice creates stunning displays that both dazzle and decimate. She is revered for her ability to bring warmth to the coldest hearts, yet her wrath is as fierce as a polar storm
hero.title: Aurora Sorceress

hero.name: Emerald Mist
short_lore: Master of subterfuge and illusion, Emerald Mist navigates the high-stakes world of Fortune Pagoda with unmatched finesse. Her ability to obscure true intentions and influence critical negotiations ensures her allies always hold the upper hand in business dealings
hero.title: title_name

hero.name: Emerald Rain
short_lore: Known for revitalizing industries and guiding investments, Emerald Rain ensures that ventures flourish under her guidance. Her strategic acumen turns potential into prosperity, making her a pivotal figure in shaping Fortune Pagoda’s economic landscape
hero.title: title_name

hero.name: Emerald Wind
short_lore: Commands the currents of trade and commerce with strategic foresight, influencing market trends and economic tides. Known for moving assets and resources with exceptional speed, ensuring Fortune Pagoda stays ahead in the world of commerce
hero.title: title_name

hero.name: Obsidian Tempest
short_lore: As the enforcer of Fortune Pagoda’s aggressive business tactics, this figure turns the tide of power, asserting dominance in market conflicts. Her tempestuous strategies ensure the Pagoda's interests are fiercely defended against rivals
hero.title: title_name

hero.name: Obsidian Raven
short_lore: Operates in the shadows to gather and control crucial intelligence, shaping Fortune Pagoda’s strategic decisions. Her foresight into market movements and hidden opportunities keeps the Pagoda ahead of its competitors
hero.title: title_name

hero.name: Ember
short_lore: From the Hidden Fox Clan, Ember's life was forever changed by a mysterious savior whose identity remains a secret. Driven by gratitude and curiosity, Ember now embarks on a quest to uncover the identity of her enigmatic benefactor, following whispers and shadows
hero.title: Enigma of the Shadows

hero.name: Petal
short_lore: In the Mythical Plains, Petal was a beacon of beauty and kindness, deeply connected to nature. Her legacy lives on in the tales of her nurturing spirit and the harmony she brought to the Fox Clan, guided by the wisdom of the ancients and the protection of the spirit
hero.title: Master of the 6 Pink Petals

hero.name: Silvie
short_lore: A wandering soul with the power of the Fox Clan, Silvie traverses the world as a guardian of ancient secrets. Her journey is guided by the whispers of spirits and the echoes of the past, as she seeks to balance her clan’s mystical heritage with her own quest for wisdom
hero.title: Soul Fox Wanderer

hero.name: Pearl
short_lore: > You can obtain this character from June 20 to September 20

> During the summer festival of the Hidden Village, Pearl emerges as a vibrant spirit of the season. Dressed in a sunny yellow beach outfit with a flower adorning her short blue hair and cat ears, she brings joy and relaxation to all. Her presence is a beacon of warmth and celebration, turning the beach into a paradise of fun and camaraderie
hero.title: Sunshine Celebrant

hero.name: Aki
short_lore: Aki's mastery over spirit manipulation mirrors the legendary feats of Petal. Her deep connection with the ethereal realm allows her to command spirits with unparalleled skill, influencing the balance of power and harmony within her clan and beyond
hero.title: Deity of the Silent Storm

hero.name: Luna
short_lore: Luna embodies the quiet strength and resilience of the Hidden Village. Her presence is a guiding light in times of darkness, blending ancient wisdom with her own mystical prowess to lead and protect her people through the most challenging trials
hero.title: Deity of the Silent Storm

hero.name: Masu
short_lore: Once a soldier scarred by conflict, Masu dedicates herself to creating a new world order. Driven by the tragedies she has witnessed, she battles fiercely to prevent future suffering and ensure justice prevails
hero.title: title_name

hero.name: World Weaver
short_lore: World Weaver harnesses ancient and forbidden knowledge to reshape the world according to her liking. Shrouded in secrecy, this enigmatic figure manipulates the threads of fate, striving to create a singular, just world through profound and often unsettling means
hero.title: Master of Destiny

hero.name: Sovereign
short_lore: Sovereign, Once a beacon of hope, has become a symbol of Darksara’s quest for ultimate justice. Known for their unyielding loyalty to the founder's vision, they serve as the shield and sword in the campaign to unify the world, driven by a profound sense of duty and sacrifice
hero.title: Unyielding Shield
